channel.title: Yell Command Help rep++
channel.description:
[code]}else if (c.playerRights == 1){ c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Mod]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"")[/code] Thats my yell command for a mod, i wont to change the colour of the writing. Would i change col=255? if so, i change that and get either black/blue! Can someone tell me ifthats the right way, if so what are some good colour codes?
Thanks
Will rep++

item.title: Yell Command Help rep++
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“NumberEleven, post:1, topic:406514”]}else if (c.playerRights == 1){ c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Mod]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"")
Thats my yell command for a mod, i wont to change the colour of the writing. Would i change col=255? if so, i change that and get either black/blue!
Can someone tell me ifthats the right way, if so what are some good colour codes?

Thanks

Will rep++[/quote]

col is a hexadecimal, represented in a decimal format (or, a base16 number represented in base10)

Read full topic

item.title: Yell Command Help rep++
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

Yes yuo change the <col=255> , and go on google , and just put in col=255 and they will give you websites that you can customize the color and give you color code…

Read full topic
